lines: 1. Aparo tinendekuom pinyno miwuoro,Ma anachopie kachieng` podho;Kachungo but Jawar,kosidhna osimbo,Norieny gisulwe maler koso?
Koso sulwe nobedie osimbona,Ka ngimanamepinyni rumo?Kachiew gi hawimar bedo e yueyoni,Sulwe norienye osimbona?
2. Kuom teko mar Jawarmond` ati kend` alem,Mond` atim rito ka jalok ji;Ni mondo awinj dwondRuodha kowachona,"Bi, idonj e morna koro."
3. Nobed mor manadeka aneno wang`e,Ngimana anaket e luete;Sulwe nobedna duong`e dala dhahabu,Ka ma nayudie gwethnyaka chieng`.
